aqgnirmUqd^^rdhA diqvaH kaqkut pati#H pRuthiqvyA aqyaM | 
aqpA(gm) rEtA(gm)#si jinvati || 
tvAma#gnEq puShka#rAqdaddhyatha#rvAq nira#manthata | 
mUqd^^rdhnO viSva#sya vAqGata#H || 
aqyamaqgniH sa#haqsriNOq vAja#sya Saqtinaqspati#H | 
mUqd^^rdhA kaqvI ra#yIqNAM || 
BuvO# yaqj~jasyaq raja#saSca nEqtA yatrA# niqyudBiqH saca#sE SiqvABi#H | 
diqvi mUqd^^rdhAna#M dadhiShE suvaqrq.ShAM jiqhvAma#gnE cakRuShE havyaqvAha$M || 
abAddhyaqgniH saqmidhAq janA#nAqM - [  ] 10
